item.title: Waitrose Cuts Prices of 200 Grocery Products
item.description: Waitrose Cuts Prices of 200 Grocery Products Waitrose, a British supermarket chain, has announced that it will be cutting the prices of 200 grocery products. The price cuts are being made in response to rising food inflation, which has reached its highest level in 45 years.
